00037 ostream* os_ = 0;
00038 const double epsilon_ = 1e-6;
00039 
00040 
00041 void testMetadata(MSDataCache& cache)
00042 {
00043     if (os_) *os_ << "testMetadata()\n";
00044 
00045     if (os_) *os_ << "spectrumCount: " << cache.size() << endl;
00046     unit_assert(cache.size() == 2);
00047 
00048     unit_assert(cache[0].index == 0);
00049     unit_assert(cache[0].id == "S19");
00050     unit_assert(cache[0].scanNumber == 19); // TODO: change to nativeID 
00051     unit_assert(cache[0].massAnalyzerType == MS_QIT);
00052     unit_assert(cache[0].msLevel == 1);
00053     unit_assert_equal(cache[0].retentionTime, 353.43, epsilon_);
00054     unit_assert_equal(cache[0].mzLow, 400.39, epsilon_);
00055     unit_assert_equal(cache[0].mzHigh, 1795.56, epsilon_);
00056     unit_assert(cache[0].precursors.empty());
00057 
00058     unit_assert(cache[1].index == 1);
00059     unit_assert(cache[1].id == "S20");
00060     unit_assert(cache[1].scanNumber == 20); // TODO:  change to nativeID
00061     unit_assert(cache[1].massAnalyzerType == MS_QIT);
00062     unit_assert(cache[1].msLevel == 2);
00063     unit_assert_equal(cache[1].retentionTime, 359.43, epsilon_);
00064     unit_assert_equal(cache[1].mzLow, 320.39, epsilon_);
00065     unit_assert_equal(cache[1].mzHigh, 1003.56, epsilon_);
00066     unit_assert(cache[1].precursors.size() == 1);
00067     unit_assert(cache[1].precursors[0].index == 0);
00068     unit_assert_equal(cache[1].precursors[0].mz, 445.34, epsilon_);
00069     unit_assert_equal(cache[1].precursors[0].intensity, 120053, epsilon_);
00070     unit_assert(cache[1].precursors[0].charge == 2);
00071 
00072     if (os_) *os_ << endl;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void testDefault()
00077 {
00078     MSData tiny;
00079     examples::initializeTiny(tiny);
00080 
00081     MSDataCache cache;
00082 
00083     cache.open(tiny);
00084 
00085     cache.update(tiny, *tiny.run.spectrumListPtr->spectrum(0));
00086     unit_assert(!cache[0].data.empty());
00087     unit_assert(cache[1].data.empty());
00088 
00089     cache.update(tiny, *tiny.run.spectrumListPtr->spectrum(1));
00090     unit_assert(cache[0].data.empty());
00091     unit_assert(!cache[1].data.empty());
00092 
00093     testMetadata(cache);
00094 }

00096 
00097 void printCache(ostream& os, const MSDataCache& cache)
00098 {
00099     os << "cached binary data:\n";
00100     for (vector<SpectrumInfo>::const_iterator it=cache.begin(); it!=cache.end(); ++it) 
00101     {
00102         os << it->index << " " 
00103            << it->data.size() << "/"
00104            << it->data.capacity() << endl;
00105     }
00106     os << endl;
00107 }

00110 void testMRU()
00111 {
00112     if (os_) *os_ << "testMRU()\n";
00113 
00114     vector<MZIntensityPair> pairs(100);
00115 
00116     SpectrumListSimplePtr sl(new SpectrumListSimple);
00117     for (size_t i=0; i<10; i++)
00118     {
00119         SpectrumPtr spectrum(new Spectrum);
00120         spectrum->setMZIntensityPairs(pairs);        
00121         spectrum->index = i;
00122         sl->spectra.push_back(spectrum);
00123     }
00124 
00125     MSData msd;
00126     msd.run.spectrumListPtr = sl;
00127 
00128     MSDataCache::Config config;
00129     config.binaryDataCacheSize = 3;
00130     MSDataCache cache(config);
00131 
00132     cache.open(msd);
00133 
00134     if (os_) *os_ << "update: 0 1 2\n";
00135     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(0, true));
00136     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(1, true));
00137     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(2, true));
00138     if (os_) printCache(*os_, cache); // mru: 2 1 0
00139 
00140     unit_assert(cache[0].data.size() == 100);
00141     unit_assert(cache[1].data.size() == 100);
00142     unit_assert(cache[2].data.size() == 100);
00143     unit_assert(cache[3].data.size() == 0);
00144 
00145     if (os_) *os_ << "update: 3\n";
00146     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(3, true));
00147     if (os_) printCache(*os_, cache); // mru: 3 2 1
00148 
00149     unit_assert(cache[0].data.capacity() == 0);
00150     unit_assert(cache[1].data.size() == 100);
00151     unit_assert(cache[2].data.size() == 100);
00152     unit_assert(cache[3].data.size() == 100);
00153 
00154     if (os_) *os_ << "update: 1\n";
00155     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(1, true));
00156     if (os_) printCache(*os_, cache); // mru: 1 3 2
00157 
00158     unit_assert(cache[0].data.capacity() == 0);
00159     unit_assert(cache[1].data.size() == 100);
00160     unit_assert(cache[2].data.size() == 100);
00161     unit_assert(cache[3].data.size() == 100);
00162 
00163     if (os_) *os_ << "update: 4\n";
00164     cache.update(msd, *sl->spectrum(4, true));
00165     if (os_) printCache(*os_, cache); // mru: 4 1 3
00166 
00167     unit_assert(cache[0].data.capacity() == 0);
00168     unit_assert(cache[1].data.size() == 100);
00169     unit_assert(cache[2].data.capacity() == 0);
00170     unit_assert(cache[3].data.size() == 100);
00171     unit_assert(cache[3].data.size() == 100);
00172 
00173     if (os_) *os_ << endl;
00174 }

00176 
00177 struct EvenRequester : public MSDataAnalyzer
00178 {
00179     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00180                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const
00181     {
00182         return (spectrumIdentity.index%2==0) ? UpdateRequest_NoBinary : UpdateRequest_None;
00183     }
00184 };
00185 
00186 
00187 void testUpdateRequest()
00188 {
00189     if (os_) *os_ << "testUpdateRequest()\n";
00190 
00191     vector<MZIntensityPair> pairs(100);
00192 
00193     SpectrumListSimplePtr sl(new SpectrumListSimple);
00194     for (size_t i=0; i<10; i++)
00195     {
00196         SpectrumPtr spectrum(new Spectrum);
00197         spectrum->setMZIntensityPairs(pairs);        
00198         spectrum->index = i;
00199         spectrum->id = "something";
00200         sl->spectra.push_back(spectrum);
00201     }
00202 
00203     MSData msd;
00204     msd.run.spectrumListPtr = sl;
00205 
00206     MSDataAnalyzerContainer analyzers;
00207     shared_ptr<MSDataCache> cache(new MSDataCache);
00208     analyzers.push_back(cache);
00209     analyzers.push_back(MSDataAnalyzerPtr(new EvenRequester));
00210 
00211     MSDataAnalyzerDriver driver(analyzers);
00212     driver.analyze(msd);
00213 
00214     for (size_t i=0, end=cache->size(); i<end; i++)
00215     {
00216         const SpectrumInfo& info = cache->at(i);
00217         if (os_) *os_ << info.index << " " << info.id << endl;
00218 
00219         // cache has only been updated with the spectra requested by EvenRequester
00220 
00221         unit_assert(i%2==0 && info.index==i && info.id=="something" ||
00222                     i%2==1 && info.index==(size_t)-1&& info.id.empty());
00223     }
00224 
00225     if (os_) *os_ << endl;
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 void testAutomaticUpdate()
00230 {
00231     if (os_) *os_ << "testAutomaticUpdate()\n";
00232 
00233     vector<MZIntensityPair> pairs(100);
00234 
00235     SpectrumListSimplePtr sl(new SpectrumListSimple);
00236     for (size_t i=0; i<10; i++)
00237     {
00238         SpectrumPtr spectrum(new Spectrum);
00239         spectrum->setMZIntensityPairs(pairs);        
00240         spectrum->index = i;
00241         spectrum->id = "something";
00242         sl->spectra.push_back(spectrum);
00243     }
00244 
00245     MSData msd;
00246     msd.run.spectrumListPtr = sl;
00247 
00248     MSDataCache cache;
00249     cache.open(msd);
00250 
00251     unit_assert(cache.size() == sl->size());
00252     for (size_t i=0; i<cache.size(); i++)
00253         unit_assert(cache[i].index == (size_t)-1);
00254 
00255     const SpectrumInfo& info5= cache.spectrumInfo(5);
00256     const SpectrumInfo& info7 = cache.spectrumInfo(7);
00257 
00258     if (os_)
00259     {
00260         for (size_t i=0; i<cache.size(); i++)
00261             *os_ << i << " " << cache[i].index << " " << cache[i].id << endl;
00262     }     
00263 
00264     unit_assert(info5.index==5 && info5.id=="something");
00265     unit_assert(cache[5].index==5 && cache[5].id=="something");
00266     unit_assert(info7.index==7 && info7.id=="something");
00267     unit_assert(cache[7].index==7 && cache[7].id=="something");
00268 
00269     for (size_t i=0; i<cache.size(); i++)
00270         if (i!=5 && i!=7)
00271             unit_assert(cache[i].index == (size_t)-1);
00272 }

00274 
00275 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00276 {
00277     try
00278     {
00279         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00280         testDefault();
00281         testMRU();
00282         testUpdateRequest();
00283         testAutomaticUpdate();
00284         return 0;
00285     }
00286     catch (exception& e)
00287     {
00288         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00289     }
00290     catch (...)
00291     {
00292         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00293     }
00294     
00295     return 1;
00296 }
